original_text: And you shall take no bribe, for a bribe blinds the clear-sighted and subverts the cause of those who are in the right.
korean_text: 너는 뇌물을 받지 말라 뇌물은 밝은 자의 눈을 어둡게 하고 의로운 자의 말을 굽게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: And you shall take no bribe
for a bribe blinds the clear-sighted
sentences.korean_translation: 뇌물은 명철한 자의 눈을 멀게 하니

sentences.original_text: and subverts the cause of those who are in the right
